channel.title: Coding.......xp rate/raising or lowering piont exchange shops
channel.description: need help i cant find where to lower or higher the piont exchange shops

item.title: Coding.......xp rate/raising or lowering piont exchange shops
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

Search for the Bgs code on your source, one of them will show up whit the number “3500” somewhere around it. If you can find it, you can change the 3500.

GREETINGZZz,
Christiaan

Read full topic
item.source: Coding.......xp rate/raising or lowering piont exchange shops

i have looked in item.cfg the prices are dif like the bgs is 3.5k pionts but it dont list it on there im using 317 pi

item.title: Coding.......xp rate/raising or lowering piont exchange shops
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:3, topic:379270”][quote author=Killerswan link=topic=475117.msg3474509#msg3474509 date=1295570686]
Editing your XP for players can be found in playerHandler or client, just do the skill find out how much xp you got then search that number. To change point exchange to higher or lower, go to items.cfg and lower their cost (Normally 1 of the first 3 if not all values) once again knowing the price of it will help you in changing it.

-Killerswan
[/quote]
[size=4pt]Wanna be mod![/size]
On topic; You haven’t Specified what you are using? 508, 317? delta? Pi? hyperion?[/quote]

Hmm, strange… I didn’t realize helping people made you a wannabe mod now?

Read full topic
